artist: Artist: Ryūryūkyo Shinsai; Author: Poem by Wagyokutei Kijō; Author: Poem by Shinkyōtei; Author: Poem by Hōshōtei Yumekichi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
和玉亭喜常 　「はゝ鷹の　宿れる松の下蕨　なれがちひさき　手にはすわらし」 
新橋亭 　「夢あはせあはずも　うれしうらゝかな　空とる春の　草房の鷹」 
寶船亭夢吉 　「初夢の鷹も人にははなさじと　のびをするにもにき（ぎ）るうれしさ」
markings: above the title: drum seal of the poetry group Taikoren
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink, color, and metallic powder on paper
portfolio: From The Tale of Genji (Genji monogatari 源氏物語)
text: related to the chs. 16–18 of the Tale of Genji and therefore maybe the 6th design in this series
title: The Chapters "At the Pass," "The Picture Contest," and "Wind in the Pines"
